bill.title: Medical Claim Conciliation; Medical Inquiry and Conciliation Panels
bill.description: Amends the medical tort chapter of the Hawaii Revised Statutes, to make the medical claim conciliation process less adversarial and to emphasize inquiry, conciliation, and settlement. Renames the panels as medical inquiry and conciliation panels. Effective January 1, 2013. (SD2)

history.action: (H) Prefiled
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to HLT, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 2
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by HLT on Tuesday, 01-24-12 10:00AM in House conference room 329.

(H) The committees on HLT recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamane, Morikawa, Belatti, Hanohano, C. Lee, Mizuno, Ching, Pine; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Jordan, Wooley.
(H) Reported from HLT (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 50-12) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.

(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Tuesday, 02-07-12 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Keith-Agaran, Rhoads, Brower, Carroll, Herkes, Ito, Luke, McKelvey, Souki, Tsuji, Fontaine, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Cabanilla, Coffman.

(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Tuesday, 02-28-12 1:00PM in House conference room 308.
(H) Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

Lee, Choy, Cullen, Giugni, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, Kawakami, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita, Marumoto, Riviere, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.

(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 106).

(S) The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPN were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Taniguchi, Nishihara, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Galuteria, Green, Solomon.
